laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Illumigene DNA amplification assay for C. difficile
laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile. Reference Range-Negative.

The appendix is not visualized separate from a complex fluid collection in the right lower quadrant, measuring 5.5 x 2.1 cm. There is wall thickening of the adjacent cecum. Other organs such as liver, pancreas, spleen, and adrenal glands show normal findings.
